channel.title: 525 Help
channel.description: Alright, I've added a static rc altar at home, so when you click the altar, you get 10k xp in rc and it'll give you 25k cash. As my server is a pk spawnconomy it brings money in for new players. BUT, there is a problem with the thieving and rc objects. you must stand in a certain tile to use these but I find it highly annoying as other players might not know and they think its broken. Lol.

item.title: 525 Help
item.dc:creator: @1800getk0ed 1800getk0ed
item.description:
@1800getk0ed wrote:

Alright, I’ve added a static rc altar at home, so when you click the altar, you get 10k xp in rc and it’ll give you 25k cash. As my server is a pk spawnconomy it brings money in for new players. BUT, there is a problem with the thieving and rc objects. you must stand in a certain tile to use these but I find it highly annoying as other players might not know and they think its broken. Lol.

Read full topic
